titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of the Frankfort National Fish Hatchery to the Commonwealth of Kentucky.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 2/26/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey the Frankfort National Fish Hatchery in Franklin County, Kentucky, to the State of Kentucky.
